mapper.select: SELECT t1.id, t1.datasource_id, t1.rule_name, t1.table_unique, t1.table_type, t1.table_business_type, t1.rule_sort, t1.rule_state, t1.rule_describe, t1.filter_scene, t2.datasource_id AS fiDataSourceId, t2.datasource_type AS sourceTypeEnum FROM tb_bizfilter_rule t1 LEFT JOIN tb_datasource_config t2 ON t1.datasource_id = t2.id WHERE t1.del_flag = 1 AND t2.del_flag = 1
